title: Fate/Grand Carnival
original_name: Fate/Grand Carnival 第一特異宴 英霊限界大祭オリンピア
opening_song: #1 cont. 1: "Super☆Affection (すーぱー ☆ あふぇくしょん)" by Mash Kyrielight (Rie Takahashi), Nitocris (Minami Tanaka), Elizabeth Báthory (Rumi Ookubo), Shuten-douji (Aoi Yuuki), Ibaraki-douji (Nao Touyama), Queen Medb (Ayane Sakura),
